sentences.en: a training session for teachers about computers
sentences.cn: 给教师上的一节电脑培训课

sentences.en: After two late night sessions, the Security Council has failed to reach agreement.
sentences.cn: 开过两次深夜会议之后，安理会仍未能达成协议。

sentences.en: Board members met in closed session (= with nobody else present ) .
sentences.cn: 委员会成员举行了闭门会议。

sentences.en: Charles and I were closeted in his study for the briefing session.
sentences.cn: 我和查尔斯在他的书房里闭门开简介会。

sentences.en: Everyone had already assembled in the boardroom for the 9:00 a.m. session.
sentences.cn: 所有人都已集中到了董事会会议室，准备参加上午9点钟的会议。

sentences.en: From September until December, Congress remained in session.
sentences.cn: 从9月到12月，国会一直都在开会。

sentences.en: He collapsed following a vigorous exercise session at his home.
sentences.cn: 在家剧烈运动了一阵后他突然昏倒了。

sentences.en: He established himself as a session musician.
sentences.cn: 他成为了一位伴奏音乐家。

sentences.en: He returned from a lunchtime drinking session with his business cronies.
sentences.cn: 中午跟那帮生意上的朋友喝完酒后，他回来了。

sentences.en: Instead, the session has sowed confusion.
sentences.cn: 相反，这次会议却引发了混乱。

sentences.en: question-and-answer sessions
sentences.cn: 问答时间

sentences.en: Rupert Moon is out of today's session with a twisted knee.
sentences.cn: 鲁珀特·穆恩扭伤了膝盖，无法参加今天的训练。

sentences.en: The Arab League is meeting in emergency session today.
sentences.cn: 阿拉伯国家联盟今天正在举行紧急会议。

sentences.en: The conference might reconvene after its opening session.
sentences.cn: 大会在开幕式结束后可能要再开会。

sentences.en: The dancers can earn anything between £20 and £30 for each session.
sentences.cn: 这些舞蹈演员每场演出的收入在20至30英镑之间。

sentences.en: The senate had a session today with closed doors.
sentences.cn: 参议院今天召开一次秘密会议.

sentences.en: The session was technically quorate.
sentences.cn: 本届会议严格说来达到了法定人数。

sentences.en: The two leaders emerged for a photo session.
sentences.cn: 两位领导现身接受记者拍照。

sentences.en: This matter will go over until the next session.
sentences.cn: 这件事将留待下次会议讨论.

sentences.en: You may wish to take advantage of our instructional session.
sentences.cn: 你应该充分利用我们的教学课程。

words.tran_cn: 会议；（法庭的）[法]开庭；（议会等的）开会；学期；讲习会

phrases.tran_cn: （美）秘密会议；行政会议（常秘密举行）
聚在一起做某事；在做某事
上下两议院的联席会议
会话管理器；对话管理员；对话管理程序
暑期班；暑假辅导；夏季学期
练习课；培训课程；训练项目

trans.tran_cn: 会议，开庭，一段时间，学年
trans.tran_en: a formal meeting or group of meetings, especially of a law court or parliament
